title: The CircleJerk Gods Have Spoken
body: This month's target is Tryndamere. Ahri is balanced now even though nothing happened to her. NOW GO AND COMPLAIN ABOUT TRYNDAMERE.

replies.body:
Tryndamere has more escapes than Yasuo or Riven, his crits are too strong, why is he able to be invulnerable AND heal? Also, I hate every single one just mindlessly splitpushes whether on my team or theirs.

Am I doing this right?

Tryndamere is bullshit, he has always been bullshit, he is bullshit even when he is not OP.
(Ahri main here <_<)
I personally think that Tryndamere is much more dumb than Ahri, so it's fine.
